title: A review on vegetable oil-based non isocyanate polyurethane: towards a greener and sustainable production route
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,9273-9299
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA08684D, Review Article
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Marwah Rayung, Noraini Abd Ghani, Norhafizah Hasanudin
The transition from conventional polyurethane (PU) to non isocyanate polyurethane (NIPU) is driven mainly by safety concerns, environmental considerations, and sustainability issues associated with the current PU technology.
